website_summaries.verdict: This Rainbow Light supplement contains calcium and vitamin D, plus magnesium, which helps the body absorb calcium and assists the musculature of the body.
pros: Good for those with allergies as it contains no dairy, gluten, wheat, soy, eggs, fish or shellfish, yeast, sugar, or sugar additives
Many users report an improvement in aches, pains, and bone density
Some users report better sleep with use
cons: Some users report difficulty taking the pills, which are uncoated and on the larger side
Select users report stomach upset with use

customer_reviews.title: Amazing calcium supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Rainbow Light Food Based Calcium for many years. I first took it for shin splints when I was running, then as I aged took it to prevent osteoporosis. It works! I am 70 years old and just had a bone density test and was told I would never have the bone thinning condition. This calcium also helped my with restless leg and toe cramps. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SuellenJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies with dairy allergies/intolerances
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. My other brand contained dairy and my baby has a dairy allergy. These do not have an odor, and don't make me burp or make me nauseous. I feel good knowing that my baby is getting the nourishment he needs while nursing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Eagan

customer_reviews.title: Adverse Effect from Product - Unable to Return
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this supplement to support health issues originally recommended by a friend, however I experienced cramping, bloating and general discomfort. I spent the money in good faith but cannot take it or get a return. Very disappointed since I have dealt with Amazon and other vendors for some time, and have never experienced this situation. Suffice it to say, I will never order from Rainbow light products nor would I recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley B

customer_reviews.title: The tablets are too big!
customer_reviews.text: If you have issues with swallowing pills then you'll probably want to move on to something else. That's the biggest complaint I have to give right now. Since I just purchased them a few days ago and received them yesterday, it's too early to give a review for how they're working. I'll probably give another review once I've taken them for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: hummingbird 77

customer_reviews.title: Food Based, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it is food based. The prices of Rainbow porducts have been lately increased considerably. This one was within the range of what I am used to so I was really glad to find it. If you can afford it, I will get Rainbow products for everything as they are food based and stomach friendly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mansur

customer_reviews.title: High quality vitamins, not the easiest to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: Good brand and seemingly good quality vitamins. According to my wife, who I bought these for, they are a bit difficult to swallow due to being larger and size and not really having a coating on them. I would still recommend these unless you are someone who struggles to swallow larger pills. I purposefully picked these because they didn't require being taken twice a day, could be why they are so large.
customer_reviews.author: CWBaierl

customer_reviews.title: I like the price!
customer_reviews.text: And the rating of this item should go up, but not the price! While I'm creating all these nice reviews, this product is one thing I don't want the price raised on. I'm noticing price increases on important items like these, which I have written some excellent 5 stars reviews for. Ummm... I wonder. Dear Amazon, please keep the price of this item affordable and always in stock because it is your absolute best Calcium supplement ever!!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherelle Red Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Not received as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I used this brand (ordered from Amazon) all throughout my pregnancy and while breastfeeding, and when I received this latest shipment, I opened it without paying too much attention. 1) Bottle does not say "food-based" and ingredients are slightly different. 2) There is a clear metallic smell to the contents. I don't know if the formulation has changed or if I just received the wrong product. Either way, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Alston

customer_reviews.title: Best Calcium - Helps Sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful calcium that we take every night and it really helps with a good nights sleep. On the nights we forget to take it there is a definite difference. Only issue can be the huge size, but we are okay with it, knowing it's benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Musicmaven

customer_reviews.title: I've noticed a difference.
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a difference taking these vs the cheap ones I have purchased at the store. I also received good results back on my last blood test.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: They are simply too large - I keep trying, because I hate to throw out something that is otherwise okay. But cutting them in half gives them hard edges and doesnt solve the problem. So I'm now going to look for something smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Only reason that I did not give 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Only reason that I did not give 5 stars is that because they are not coated they are a bit hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Joan E.

customer_reviews.title: This must have been made for horses!
customer_reviews.text: The pill is HUGE! I have tried breaking it in half, but it sometimes gets stuck in my throat. The only way I can swallow this overly large pill is to chew it, but it leaves a chalky taste. I will be throwing this away and going back to a capsule!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - received as described and quickly without issue. I am extremely pleased with this product. It is a larger tablet, but I have no difficulty swallowing it. I do not believe it has any taste since you swallow and not chew it.
customer_reviews.author: Al Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This calcium is not Food Based. The ingredients are also not the same as the container that says “Food Based”. I have a sensitive stomach and will not risk taking these. The company will not let me return or exchange them for what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be swallowed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, I just cannot swallow it! Too big and even if you do in halves it doesn’t work cause it is so rough that it becomes very difficult to swallow
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: In addition to an overall better feeling, our sleep has improved as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Both my wife and I noticed a significant difference after talking this product. In addition to an overall better feeling, our sleep has improved as well as the ability to face the day-to-day stress during the workweek.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the naturality
customer_reviews.text: I only dislike the size, just because it's hard to swallow. But it does work well. I take them before bed because they make me sleepy.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lace-dye

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Since my co worker recommended this product I have been feeling great. Needed more calcium in my diet. Not just by regular multi vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Packing suspicious
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but when I took the container out of the packaging it was slimy. The product seems to be ok because the seal was not broken. I placed the pills in a different container and trashed the original.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys H. Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: ... for over a year and believe it to be superior in quality to any I've found locally
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for over a year and believe it to be superior in quality to any I've found locally. Being food derived makes it easier for the body to use. I recommend this brand highly.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel A. Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe and do not allow returns!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. The seal was open and I’m unable to return. They are also horse pills and smell horrendous. Again they do not honor amazon return policy. It is not safe to take pills that are not sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Adorable

customer_reviews.title: I love that it's food based too
customer_reviews.text: The price is right and delivery is fast. This vitamin has just what I was looking for in a calcium supplement. Magnesium, K & D3 in particular. This is the only brand I buy! I love that it's food based too.
customer_reviews.author: VickieV

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Second time I've ordered these; I like this brand, well known for quality supplements. Large horse pills but easy to swallow for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge and hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak to the effectiveness of this product, I’m sure it good. I bought it because it was good based rather than synthetic. I will finish out my bottle but will not be purchasing again. The pills are very large and hard to swallow. I’ve never had an issue with this before, and take many other vitamins with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Zena

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Light Calcium
customer_reviews.text: I've always been happy with Rainbow Light supplements including their food-based calcium. My recent blood work results showed an adequate level of vitamin D and Calcium so this product must be doing what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: N. Nas

customer_reviews.title: t based calcium
customer_reviews.text: I use daily as calcium supplement. Chose it because it is food based.
customer_reviews.author: ccp

customer_reviews.title: Not what I purchased, not able to return
customer_reviews.text: I did not order this item, the description and photo for the item I purchased was for Magnesium and Calcium. This is a different dose and different product. AND now this item is not eligible for return. I attempted to return it today, the day it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One per day and good price! Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I love them because they are easy on my stomach and only one pill per day. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Kelliher

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is being sold as a food base calcium but my stiff joints tell me otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: gagar

customer_reviews.title: Constipation and gas troubles..
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t quite work well for me. I had constipation and gas troubles when I took these. It’s my experience, so may or may not be the same for you.
customer_reviews.author: QualityAddict

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the chewable chalky calcium available
customer_reviews.text: Rather large pill but I don't mind. Much better than the chewable chalky calcium available.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine N

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Item pictured was not what arrived. Purchased this based on the nutritional facts and it being a single dose. Arrived was a similar product but requires taking three doses instead.
customer_reviews.author: Brandt K.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, decent price.
customer_reviews.text: As a vegan I use these to guarantee sufficient daily calcium intake. Good product, decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Anaiscourt

customer_reviews.title: I been looking for a good calcium supplement and this fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well. I been looking for a good calcium supplement and this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Hileski

customer_reviews.title: Huge pill
customer_reviews.text: Hard to swallow. Like there’s D and Calcium, but the pill is so big it’s hard to swallow
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to digest seems to work well, Rainbow Light is my favorite brand.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hoenecke

customer_reviews.title: most of vitamins were broken inside
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed to find that a good majority of the vitamins inside the packaging were broken and crumbled. Basically half of the vitamins needed to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Grunstein

customer_reviews.title: Best calcium out there
customer_reviews.text: Best potency and Best in least amount of synthetic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Huge pill, constipation, gas, upset stomach....
customer_reviews.text: I gave this supplement a solid 1 month try - it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: The best !!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken these for years they are the best you really feel better
customer_reviews.author: cindy e

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why, but everytime I take these I feel light headed and they seem to make me sleepy. I stopped taking them.
customer_reviews.author: LSD

customer_reviews.title: easy on GI
customer_reviews.text: I have had no GI symptoms and could NOT take other calcium supplements because of that. They are Big though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Does not disolve at all in a vinegar test which means it will not disolve in your digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: EJoy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best calcium magnesium supplement! Works great. No filler!
customer_reviews.author: Randyl B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this company
customer_reviews.text: I've vetted many supplement companies and am a big fan of this one. Calcium must include Magnesium and D to help with absorption. I use this one just about every day.
customer_reviews.author: pam mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. You can trust the quality of rainbow products.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Ruff

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: tablets are too big and grainy so i have to cut them in halves
customer_reviews.author: Lisey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with the Rainbow Lite Calcium/ magnesium vitamins. Vitamins make me sick when taking them . Rainbow Lite are the only ones that I can take .
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Porduct is great supplement
customer_reviews.text: Easy on stomach. Love that it is food based. Way better than citrical or citrate due how it breaks down in the body - food based. Purchased product several times in the past and plan to keep purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: RJMAZ

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I know it could be a placebo effect, but I swear these are so potent, I can feel them working! I appreciate that the ingredients are so clear and that they are food-based.
customer_reviews.author: Funkalicious

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product recommended to me by a holistic pharmacist
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product recommended to me by a holistic pharmacist. Much better price than at the specialty pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can only say I was diagnosed with osteopenia about 5 years ago and now I have a very good bone density scoring for my age
customer_reviews.text: I know there is uncertainty about calcium supplements via tablets helping in bone development. I can only say I was diagnosed with osteopenia about 5 years ago and now I have a very good bone density scoring for my age. I will not take calcium carbonate or citrate tablets, but this is food based and if any calcium supplements work, food based calcium is the one recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Llama Lady from VA

customer_reviews.title: Also has magnesium
customer_reviews.text: I really like a few Rainbow-Light products, especially because they are food-based. I used their prenatal vitamins when pregnant and was really happy with them. I should have read the description better for these, but didn't realize that they also had magnesium. I wish they didn't as I like taking the supplements separately. I prefer Blue Bonnet calcium now.
customer_reviews.author: Evie FoxTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love this food based vitamin. Is very easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Our bottle arrived with a hole in the seal of the bottle. It appears to have been tampered with at some point. This item is not eligible for return so I guess we are out the $15 we spent on it. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Food based vitamins are amazing. It's better option in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Food based vitamins are amazing. It's better option in my opinion. The pills are slightly large but you can easily take your pills with water.
customer_reviews.author: K W.

customer_reviews.title: pregnancy risk, do not purchase. contains horsetail with no warning label
customer_reviews.text: Zero warning label for pregnancy. contains horsetail which is to be avoided
customer_reviews.author: Patryk

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: This brand is great but I find these pills too large to swallow with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine deBlieux

customer_reviews.title: The pills are really large. I have to cut ...
customer_reviews.text: The pills are really large. I have to cut each one and they are still too thick to swallow. If they were small I would buy again but will not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Too large to swallow
customer_reviews.text: These are way too big to swallow. I had one lodged in my throat for 10 minutes, no matter how much water I drank it wouldn't dislodge. In the end I had to force myself to throw up to remove it. Even cutting these in half they are still difficult to swallow. Due to the texture they end up scratching your throat. This product needs to be designed in a gel capsule form for easier swallowing. I'm now left with a product I can't use so cannot recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Dean08

customer_reviews.title: This product is totally awesome. I love natural products and used to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is totally awesome. I love natural products and used to buy it at my health food store, but Amazon is clearly less expensive and if you have prime its even better. This product has a probiotic in it to help with sensitive stomach issues.I've been taking this for years now. Very satisfied customer. Try it you'll like it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective calcium supplement
customer_reviews.text: These pills are large and kind of square corners so they aren't that easy to swallow. They don't really have much flavor but I don't let them dissolve in my mouth either. I've been taking them for years though and they seem to be effective in keeping my calcium level high enough to prevent progressions of osteopenia. The added horsetail and magnesium aids in absorption. I take 2 a day, morning and evening, with food. The doctor recommended 1,200 mg of calcium daily and these give me 1,000. I figure I get the rest through diet. These are the only calcium supplement I can really take that doesn't upset my gut.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best brand for food based calcium
customer_reviews.text: Rainbow light veggie calcium is still the best option. I've been using it for at least 8-9 years now. This particular one, however, you need to be careful because if you take 3 pills a day (like I would need for a full daily dosage of calcium for women over 50), it has a lot of magnesium. That's fine for me (although I now reduced it to two pills a day), but for others it could be just too much magnesium (with the side effect of having very loose stools).
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: After trying many, this one is part of my routine
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third container of this product, and I'm very happy. I take calcium for my health, as we all probably do, and I have taken many other pills that are hard to swallow or tastes terrible. This one is really easy to swallow and has a fairly neutral taste. I have been very happy with it and keep buying it as part of my morning vitamin regime.
customer_reviews.author: G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T SWALLOW
customer_reviews.text: The pills are HUGE. There isn't any note of their size in the product description provided by the manufacturer. Even when split in half they are extremely difficult to swallow because they are also thick besides being long. And unable to return for refund/exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pills big enough for a horse's mouth. Not sure about human.
customer_reviews.text: These are the biggest pills ever. So difficult to swallow as there's no coating. I don't know if I can get through the entire bottle, but I'm a cheap ass so I guess I'll have to. It won't be fun.
customer_reviews.author: oldschoolbooknerd

customer_reviews.title: Extremely hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: These are horse pills and normally don’t mind but there is NOT Soft coating (that I can tell) and extremely hard to swallow. The amount of calcium and magnesium is great but Rainbow Light needs to focus on making better coating to swallowing these pills it make same ingredients in smaller pillow even if eat means taking more pills.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Banana

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good quality but hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: They are huge, they are coated so it makes it easier to swallow, but they are still just so big. If you have trouble swalloing maybe these aren't the ones for you. Either way I don't know if I should be able to feel a difference with calcium, I'm 28, I don't have any bone issues per se. My MD said they are good quality, it is just so damn hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: love this brand
customer_reviews.text: When I look for vitamins I always check to see if Rainbow Light has it first. They are the only B vitamin brand that doesnt upset my stomach or smell terrible. I also tend to get headaches from calcium pills but I dont have any side effects from these. Best of all they are vegetarian so not always easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: These are the hardest pills to swallow ever produced
customer_reviews.text: Even broken in half, my husband had a literal twenty-minute choking fit on one of these. Even I’ve been having trouble finishing the bottle after he died and for the same reason. I will certainly never buy this brand again, period.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Seems to absorb well
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these while pregnant. I occasionally get leg cramps and will up the dose to 2 (I do eat calcium rich foods too) and it seems to help. Based on that I believe it absorbs well.
customer_reviews.author: allsmiles

customer_reviews.title: Food based, no clumping up my system!
customer_reviews.text: Most tablet form of Calcium clogged my drain, if you know what I mean lol. Not with food based Rainbow Light! Subscribe and save. Sometime they go off of subscribe but I pay the 15% for their consistency and quality. Wish they wouldn't take away from those who ordered this way. Can't always get whatcha want, oh well, still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: AWD

customer_reviews.title: These are BIG pills...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have trouble swallowing these quite large pills, but some might. Otherwise, I don't have any problems after having taken them for about 10 days now.
customer_reviews.author: Faith G

customer_reviews.title: Calcium
customer_reviews.text: This is a good calcium supplement to take, if you're not consuming it otherwise, especially since it's food-based. Do note it's only possible to fully digest one pill at a time. If taking more than one per day, space them out so your body can properly absorb the vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Lemony Snicket

customer_reviews.title: Great vegan and vegetarian product
customer_reviews.text: Great levels of vitamins. The pill does't dissolve before I can swallow it down. I like the calcium dosage size because I can decide how many to take each day based upon the foods I eat. The Vit D is important especially in winter and for summer days I wear sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Floridayogi

customer_reviews.title: Best effective and digestible vitamin for great health
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best all natural, easily digestible vitamin. It has highest quality natural and organic ingredients. No stomach upset.
customer_reviews.author: mrswhit

customer_reviews.title: Big and Mild
customer_reviews.text: The Rainbow Light supplements are easy on my stomach and don't taste terrible. The pills are very big, but Calcium tabs always seem to be. I like that the magnesium and vitamin D-3 are included.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Sue

customer_reviews.title: I have had osteopenia for years. Even though I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had osteopenia for years. Even though I take letrozole after having breast cancer, taking this calcium has prevented me from getting osteoporosis. I take vitamin D with this. Because this is a 'food-based' supplement, I NEVER get an upset stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Hartburn

customer_reviews.title: Does not upset my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Rainbow Light for years. I tried to switch one time and the other brand upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Best food-based multi-mineral for us.
customer_reviews.text: First choice for budget-meets-efficacy after decades of experience with a variety of natural supplements. I like this one better than their brand's capsules version as well.
customer_reviews.author: Canary

customer_reviews.title: Dietician recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dietician recommended this brand after taking it through all her filters. The pills are large so I break in 1/2 for swallowing. Well recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: dhowerton

customer_reviews.title: A good source of calcium and Vitamin D3.
customer_reviews.text: The D3 in this calcium supplement is easily absorbed and doesn't make me dizzy like some D3 vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Henry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My body feels better and tolerates these better than any other I've tried. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Good suppliment, but hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: The supplement is great - seems to be well-absorbed since it's quickly effective when I need it to be. That said, I find the pill hard to swallow - not a problem I normally have. There's something about the size, shape, and coating I think. For contrast, I find the Ester C pill easy to take together with a handful of other suppliments and it's slightly larger.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Deuel

customer_reviews.title: One pill a day
customer_reviews.text: Like other Rainbow Light supplements that I have tried, the pills are rather large. I like that I only have to take one per day, so that is balanced out. It has the combination of ingredients that my doctor has required.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S.

customer_reviews.title: Continuall Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and seems best around for a calcium supplement
customer_reviews.author: Jveal

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: pills are a bit large, and calcium citrate is probably a better way to go, but came as expected and good supplement for those concerned about calcium deficiency. I also like this a lot because you can take it without food in between meals unlike other pills.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter highly recommended this item to me, all natural, and best absorbency, the only thing I do not like is they are to big for me so I have to split them to take
customer_reviews.author: laurie matthews

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to get the best calcium
customer_reviews.text: Been taking it for many years, and highly recommend it over other calcium sources
customer_reviews.author: DKW

customer_reviews.title: Hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: These pills are big and hard to swallow. I choked on them. I can not take them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bryn Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked better
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as good as Rainbow light everyday calcium.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: A good Calcium Magnesium
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a calcium that works and magnesium is just the right amount.
customer_reviews.author: Merike S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonder vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I regularly have to be checked for calcium and vitamin D levels. This is the one product I have used that has keep my levels at their best.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best calcium supplement I have ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Hays

customer_reviews.title: Acid Reflux
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was supposed to be easy on my stomach and it wasn't. It got my acid reflux going.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: These are big and hard-to-swallow. I'm at an age where it might be worth spending more $ for a product that's easier to take....
customer_reviews.author: Pokey

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for making sure to get enough calcium
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a really good product. On days that I don't get enough calcium from milk, I take one of these. Additionally, I have noticed that if I have acid indigestion, taking one of these calms it down after a half hour or so. The only thing I wish was different about this, is that I wish it was a one to one ration of calcium and magnesium. I also wish they didn't use magnesium oxide, but I understand why they do. I have taken this on an empty stomach with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the Rainbow Light vitamin line and take the food based calcium daily The seller was great. Item was exactly as described and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: MamaC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad overall, the could do more in balancing Calcium values and Vit D levels but overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Kronos

product_meta.title: Rainbow Light - Food-Based Calcium - Supports Bone Density, Muscle Relaxation, & Calcium Absorption - 180 Tablets
product_meta.description: Rainbow Light Food-Based Calcium provides the added bone density support you need every day in just one tablet. Formulated with a two-to-one ratio of 500 milligrams of calcium to 250 milligrams of magnesium, this formula also contains mineral rich stinging nettle, horsetail, and organic spirulina to support bones, relax muscles, and help with digestion and utilization. Food-Based Calcium is safe and easy on the stomach. When taken as directed, it can help support bone health. Food-Based Calcium provides 500 milligrams of calcium to help build and strengthen bones and teeth, plus 250 milligrams of magnesium and 500 IU of vitamin D3 to promote enhanced calcium absorption and utilization. Additionally, vitamin D3 and magnesium support muscle relaxation and bone flexibility.
feature_bullets: BONE HEALTH: 2:1 ratio of calcium and magnesium for strong teeth and bones
VITAMIN D3: 500 IU of vitamin D3 to help calcium absorption and utilization
NATURAL ENERGY: Organic spirulina, horsetail, and stinging nettle for natural energy
ALLERGY-FRIENDLY: Contains NO gluten, wheat, milk, nuts, soy, eggs, fish, shellfish, yeast, sugar or artificial additives
